dbQuery.query: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ILI_DATA_ID ID, t.* FROM PODS.ILI_DATA t JOIN pods.ili_anomaly_type_cl ia ON t.anomaly_type_cl = ia.code AND ia.category_cl = 1) d WHERE {FILTER}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ILI_DATA_ID ID, t.* FROM PODS.ILI_DATA t JOIN pods.ili_anomaly_type_cl ia ON t.anomaly_type_cl = ia.code AND ia.category_cl = 1) d WHERE {FILTER}
